subject: Pro X ultra pedals disconnected
description_text:
I swapped out the elastomers for the yellow ones and was calibrating them,
when i went to see how the brake was set\up in the software it wasnt
registering and then the pedals disconnected. The lights have all gone to
default and i cant get them working again. Ive tried turning the pc off and
on again, unplugging the usb, using different usb port but it just wont
connect. In device maintenance on windows it appears as if there is an
error with them
